Class Plugboard

  • Object
    • Permutator
      • Plugboard

  • public class Plugboard
extends Permutator
    Plugboard component of Engima machine.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Plugboard()
      Create an empty plugboard to add cables to later.
